name: HEX Code 3&6 chars
description: This will detect both 3 and 6 hex color codes
content:
6 Characters
#4De2A7
32Eda1
3 Characters
#45D
3eA
Invalid
#4sa2r2

If you want this to work with a single string and not a paragraph, use the following:
^#?(?:[a-fA-F\d]{2}?)(?:[a-fA-F\d]{2}?)(?:[a-fA-F\d]{2}?)$/i
author: Michael Richins
